snippet.title: Ring of Titans 1.0 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ring of Titans is a modern take on the small-scale fast-paced arena genre. Pick a Titan and queue up to play 1v1, 2v2, or 3v3, the first team to eliminate everyone from the other team wins. No grinding, no pay to win, no RNG. Just queue and play.

Ring of Titans has been in Early Access since Feb 2022 - this trailer announces the 1.0 release date, which comes with a ton of new features:
- 16 total playable Titans
- Brand new graphics
- New rank system with Bronze, Silver, Gold, etc
- New CTF game mode
- Titan Points & Runes
- Improved onboarding experience for new players
- In-game friends list & party system (no need to be Steam friends anymore)
- Chat channels, whispers, chat tabs
- Lobby Activities
  - In-lobby duels
  - A new, more challenging jump quest
  - Prize Wheel that you can spin daily to win Obols
- Daily Quests
- Tons of new cosmetics, including weapons, emotes, and more
- Daily shop rotating out cosmetic items
- And loads more

Wishlist at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1460550/Ring_of_Titans/ to prepare for the 1.0 release on October 21st.

Learn more at https://ringoftitans.com

See you in The Ring on October 21st for the full 1.0 release.
